entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
